about.details:
Incorporated in 2019, Shine Fashions (India) Ltd is one of the leading importers and suppliers of Microdot Fusible Interlinings. The company is primarily engaged in supplying, trading, and importing of non-woven interlining fabrics, woven interlining fabrics, and microdot fusible interlinings. It offers a diversified range of products such as Cap Interlinings, Woven Stretch Interlining, Hot Web Adhesive, Tricot, Cotton Fusible Interlinings, and Trafetta.

Business sources products from reliable manufacturers and supply goods in bulk to customers in different sizes to cater to diverse customers' requirements. The company produces the best quality of fabrics, for which, it has various departments at its infrastructure facilities such as testing, quality control, packaging, and others.

Competitive strength

  • Experienced promoters and a well-trained employee base.
  • Strong relationship with suppliers.
  • Quality standard and assurance
  • Strong geographical reach

faqs.question: What is the Shine Fashions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shine Fashions IPO is a SME IPO of 399000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹1.60 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹40 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on October 22, 2020, and closes on October 26, 2020.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shine Fashions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shine Fashions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shine Fashions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shine Fashions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shine Fashions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.answer: Shine Fashions IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Shine Fashions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Shine Fashions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
